description: doc: clarify that the displayed tar file name is an example

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM. On 28/09/2012, at 8:01, adg@golang.org wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg > > > Description: > doc: clarify that the displayed tar file name is an example > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6573065/ > > Affected files: > M doc/install.html > > > Index: doc/install.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/install.html > +++ b/doc/install.html > @@ -116,14 +116,20 @@ > >

> Extract the archive > -into /usr/local, creating a Go tree in /usr/local/go: > +into /usr/local, creating a Go tree in /usr/local/go. > +For example: >

> > 
> -tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.0.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
> +tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.0.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz
>
> >

> +The name of the archive may differ, depending on the version of Go you are > +installing and your system's operating system and processor architecture. > +

> + > +

> (Typically these commands must be run as root or through sudo.) >

> > >

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=49b27543b08b ***

doc: clarify that the displayed tar file name is an example
